author: IGN
description:
Check out the Solo Mode and Customization Update Trailer for The Precinct, an action open-world detective crime game developed by Fallen Tree Games. The new update is packed with 2 game-changing features with Solo mode to tackle the game as a lone player, and a suite of Customization options being brought to the game too, with 6 different vinyls for the patrol vehicle, 10 outfits, 8 hats, and 4 types of glasses to create a distinct style. The Solo Mode and Customization Update for The Precict is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Precinct - Official Solo Mode and Customization Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tech Tesseract stopps by the IGN studio to build two completely different Intel-powered PCs! Nay tackles a no-compromise, high-performance creator PC featuring the Intel Core Ultra 9 285K and an RTX 5080, perfect for heavy multitasking, editing, and streaming. This all-white build is as powerful as it is stunning!

Meanwhile, Josh is assembling a budget gaming PC designed to dominate 1080p high-refresh rate gaming. He's rocking the Intel Core i7-14700K paired with the Intel Arc B580 GPU, proving you don't need to break the bank for incredible gaming performance.

In this video, we'll cover:
- Component breakdowns for both builds (CPUs, GPUs, Motherboards, RAM, Storage, Cases).
- Installation tips and a look at our shared components (Corsair Dominator RAM & Crucial SSDs).
- Performance goals for each PC and how they achieve them.
- The excitement of the first boot.

Whether you're a content creator looking for a powerhouse rig or a gamer on a budget, Intel's got you covered for all you
title: Ultimate Creator PC vs. Budget Gaming PC

author: IGN
description:
Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the latest Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant trailer to see combat and more of what you can expect from this upcoming DLC for the RPG. Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant brings a new playable character named White Wolf, a new land to explore, more than 40 new monsters and bosses, 15 new tracks by Eddie Marianukroh, and a fishing mini-game. Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant will be available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch on August 7, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant - Official Release Date Trailer

 #HeroesOfMountDragon #ReleaseDate #IndieGame #bundle-badass-brawler

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Welcome Teaser Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the next installment and the introduction of Marvel's First Family to the MCU, distributed by Marvel Studios. Get a look at more shots, including an intense chase scene through the cosmos with The Fantastic Four and the Silver Surfer. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is relasing in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as her
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official Welcome Teaser Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby

author: IGN
description:
Mon Mothma takes a stand against Emperor Palpatine in the Galactic Senate. Watch this Andor Season 2 clip from the Star Wars series. Andor: Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. All episodes of Andor: Season 2 are streaming now on Disney+.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue
title: Andor Season 2 - Official 'Mon Mothma’s Senate Speech' Clip (2025) Genevieve O’Reilly

author: IGN
description: Dinosaurs! A timeless obsession of toddlers, scientists and everyone in between, these terrible lizards have been a mainstay of movies since the dawn of cinema. After all, what better test of movie magic than convincingly bringing long-extinct animals back to life? With Jurassic World Rebirth proving yet again that the Jurassic Park turned World franchise is alive and well, we figured it was a good enough time to revisit some of the best dinosaur movies ever made, from the terrifying special effects showcases like Jurassic Park, The Lost World, Jurassic World and the various sequels like Fallen Kingdom and Dominion to the animated features aimed at younger kids like The Land Before Time, Disney’s Dinosaur, Pixar’s The GOOD Dinosaur, and a whole bunch of older classics that might seem prehistoric to modern audiences, but which are still fascinating to watch for their effects, like One Million Years B.C. and The Valley of Gwangi, showcasing the early stop-motion work of the legendary Ra
title: The 10 Best Dinosaur Movies of All Time

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Road to Glory and Superstar Overview Trailer for both College Football 26 and Madden 26, two American College and NFL-level football simulation game developed by EA. Players can rise from star student-athlete to hometown legend in College Football 26 with the Road to Glory while the Superstar mode can allow players to import their Road to Glory progress to impact their draft position and overall experience to reach the peak of the NFL. Get the full rundown here on the latest trailer for both Road to Glory and Superstar modes for College Football 26 and Madden 26, respectively with College Football 26 launching on July 10 and Madden 26 launching on August 14 for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC.

#CollegeFootball26 #Madden26 #Gaming
title: College Football 26 and Madden 26 - Official Road to Glory and Superstar Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Badlands Expansion Announcement Teaser Trailer for DayZ, a survival online co-op zombie game developed by Bohemia Interactive. Players can explore a new area of DayZ with the upcoming Badlands expansion allowing players to enter the troubled territories of Nasdara Province, the largest map ever added to DayZ. Forge alliances, fight for control, and explore the secrets within the area. The Badlands Expansion for DayZ is coming in 2026 for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC (Steam).

#DayZ #DayZBadlands #Gaming
title: DayZ - Official Badlands Expansion Announcement Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: It's the franchise 65 million years in the making! And it's come a long ways since the original Jurassic Park first cashed in on the idea of bringing dinosaurs back to life. With Jurassic World Rebirth marking the 7th movie in the series it's time to head back to the Cretaceous period where it all began to get the full Jurassic Park / World recap.
title: Jurassic World Recap

description: Dystopian rhythm-platformer Antro – perhaps a mix of Inside and Hi-Fi Rush – is launching today on PC, PS5, and Xbox. Check out the launch trailer, and wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1861250/Antro/
title: Antro - Official Launch Trailer

title: The Midnight Walkers - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Squid Game 'Let The Games Begin' UEFN Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players will now be able to create their very own Squid Game Islands making use of Fortnite's UEFN and Fortnite Creative Mode. Start with the Squid Game Template and get to use unique weapons, galleries, props, and more to cultivate your very own Squid Game. Squid Game UEFN assets are available now in UEFN and Fortnite Creative Mode with publishing of levels to start on August 14.

#Fortnite #SquidGame #IGN
title: Fortnite x Squid Game - Official 'Let The Games Begin' UEFN Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Summer is here and July 2025 is packed with game launches! Whether you're into mechs, cozy farming, college football, stealth adventures, or chaotic party games, there’s something for everyone this month. In this video, we break down the biggest new games of July 2025, complete with release dates, platforms, and gameplay details.

Highlights this month include Mecha Break, a stylish free-to-play mech shooter; EA Sports College Football 26, the long-awaited revival of a fan-favorite series; Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4 Remaster, a slick upgrade of two iconic games; Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate, and Donkey Kong Bananza, the latest Switch 2 exclusive with big DK energy. We also cover standout indies like Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream, Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, Neon Abyss 2, Worship, and more.

Presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.

Timecodes: 
00:00 - Intro  
00:50 - Mecha Break  
01:44 - Harvest Moon: Lost Valley and Skytree Village  
02:02 - EA Sports College Foot
title: The Biggest Game Releases of July 2025

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo Switch 2 has been here for a couple of weeks now, and we’re starting to get a better idea of what we love about Nintendo’s new console and what we’d change. This week, join Logan Plant, Seth Macy, and Reb Valentine as they break down their favorite features, like the new Pro Controller, and more!

This week’s show is Logan Plant, Seth Macy, Rebekah Valentine, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Our Favorite New Features on Switch 2 - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at 9 minutes of action-packed gameplay from Alpha Response, an action tactical police shooter developed by Ultimo Ratio Games. Players can get the rundown on the moment-to-moment gameplay from saving civilians, engaging in intense gunfights, and protecting assets from being stolen. Alpha Response is available now for PC in Steam Early Access.

Wishlist Alpha Response on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089250/Alpha_Response/
title: Alpha Response: 9 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Squid Game season 3, reviewed by Shannon Miller.
Squid Game finds its way to a memorable ending, but not without some notable hang-ups. New games and cycles of trauma drive home the cruelty of this universe in novel ways, and Lee Jung-jae wraps up his iconic portrayal of  Gi-hun in stunning fashion. Some of season 3’s twists manage to cleverly (and punishingly) illustrate the long-lasting ripple effects of a capitalist hellscape while others, like expanded roles for the wealthy VIPs watching and wagering on the games, add unnecessary noise. This final chapter isn't without flaws, but it still delivers the suspense and cinematic polish that made Squid Game a hit in the first place.

#IGN
title: Squid Game Season 3 Review

author: IGN
description: Watch the Animated Showcase Trailer for Absolum, an upcoming action-adventure RPG beat 'em up developed by DotEmu. Players will go head-to-head against enemy forces serving Sun King Azra to take back the magic of Talamh. Don't miss the latest animated trailer for Absolum, coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Absolum - Official Animated Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Showcase Trailer for Bubble Bobble: Sugar Dungeons, a 2D platforming installment in the Bubble Bobble series developed by Taito Corporation. Players will embark on a grand adventure through ever-changing dungeons. Blow bubbles to catch bullies, use horns and spikes to burst the bubbles, and progress through a vibrant journey. Bubble Bobble: Sugar Dungeons is launching in Winter 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Bubble Bobble: Sugar Dungeons - Official Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fast travel is back in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, but this time, it’s not Fragile’s umbrella doing the work. In this guide, we’ll explain how to unlock and use the DHV Magellan and transponder – two powerful tools that let you skip the long walks and move between regions (and even continents) with ease. Learn when fast travel becomes available, how to set it up, and the key differences between the Magellan and Beach Jumping.

00:00 - Intro
00:24 - When Does Fast Travel Unlock?
01:12 - How to Use Fast Travel

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding2
title: How to Fast Travel in Death Stranding 2 | DHV Magellan and Transponder Explained

author: IGN
description:
The big question with Sea of Remnants is if its unmistakably cool presentation and interesting hodgepodge of ideas can actually come together into something coherent, and I truly feel no closer to answering that after more than six hours with it. Watch the video for our full first impressions. Previewed by Travis Northup

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sea of Remnants: Sea of Thieves Piracy Meets Persona 5 Stylishness, But Is It More Than Skin-Deep?

description: Take a look at the latest arrival to the GameCube offerings to Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack with Super Mario Strikers, the arcade soccer game developed by Nintendo. Super Mario Strikers is available now for Nintendo Switch 2 for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members.

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2 brings back the birthday surprise – and this time, it's tied to a hidden cutscene you won’t want to miss. In this video, we’ll walk you through exactly how to unlock the secret birthday scene, including when it becomes available and what steps you need to take to trigger it.
We’ll cover:
How to set up your birthday for the cutscene
When and where the scene becomes available
The exact mission you need to complete beforehand

0:00 Intro
0:24 How to Unlock the Cutscene
1:49 Full Birthday Cutscene (4K)

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Stranding 2: How to See the Hidden Birthday Surprise | Full Cutscene 4K
